name: Chocolate Cake
description: Chocolate Cake : This wickedly delicious rich moist chocolate cake is smothered in a complete case of finest chocolate.

name: Angel Food Cake
description: The Angel Food Cake is baked in a tube pan and uses egg whites, cream of tartar, flour, and sugar as ingredients.

name: Black Forest Cake
description: The black forest cake is originated in Germany and usually made using chocolate, whipped cream, and cherries.

name: Cupcakes
description: A cup-sized version of cakes, cupcakes are too good for small and sweet hunger calls. From kids to elderly people, everyone is fond of these tiny delicacies.

name: Heart-Shaped Cake
description: Heartshaped cakes mostly sell on occasions like Valentineâ€™s Day and Anniversaries. Can be baked in any flavour!

name: Rainbow Cake
description: As the name defines, rainbow cakes look like a rainbow. They have seven different layers of all the colours from the rainbow. Kids are fond of the colours, and also, it is a feast on romance.
